job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
As a Data Scientist at IBM, you will help transform our clients’ data into tangible business value by analyzing information, communicating outcomes and collaborating on product development. Work with Best in Class open source and visual tools, along with the most flexible and scalable deployment options. Whether it’s investigating patient trends or weather patterns, you will work to solve real world problems for the industries transforming how we live.
Solution Architect
Consultants in IBM’s Public Market sector serve as trusted advisors to state and local governments throughout the United States. The Solution Architect position will be responsible for delivering cognitive solutions contributing to the success of their core business. Responsibilities include analyzing the effectiveness of our products and service offerings, helping clients design solutions to meet their business processes and practices, and developing recommendations for improving Client processes. This position will work closely with team members responsible for creating and refining cognitive and analytical solutions for our state and local government clients.
15+ years' of system integration, application and/or solution architecture
Desired Education: Advanced degree (Masters or Doctorate) in Information Management or other relevant field
Manage teams of varying sizes performing solution development
Create data models and database designs
Design business intelligence and analytical solutions
Strategic communications with state and local officials
Responsible for automated deployment (DevOps) in cloud-based environments (Microsoft Azure preferred)
N/A
